name: Walmart Pro
description: A full-stack inventory management PWA concept that calculates the fastest in-store routes for order fulfillment. The front-end is built with Next.js, while the Java back-end runs the A* (A-Star) and Traveling Salesman pathfinding algorithms.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive portfolio website designed to showcase my projects and skills. Built using React and Tailwind CSS for blazingly fast performance and easy styling.

name: Intelligent Farm Layout System
description: A productivity tool for managing daily tasks. Uses React Native for cross-platform mobile support and Firebase for real-time data synchronization.

name: EcoStore
description: A dynamic weather dashboard that fetches data from the OpenWeather API. Displays current conditions and a 5-day forecast for user-selected cities.
